column4: Does anyone know how painful Maverick's transition to Xorg server 1.9 is going to be?
many newer ethernet devices automatically detect where a crossover cable should be used instead of a straight-through though, especially gigabit devices
but a standard nic cable wont work with direct connection, need to be a cross-over.
If its not a bug, but an Idea for special feature request, you can go here: http://brainstorm.ubuntu.com/
